name: Crystal Blooms
description:
This is a Steven Universe fan game revolving around Pearl and Amethyst getting to know each other in a flowershop AU. Very self indulgent little project, but I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it.

Inspirations:

Greatly inspired by the excellent ASMR series Talk Floral to Me by YuuriVoice

Other sources:

  • Aleexischristine's florist youtube channel 
  • navigatrixloves's post: "Flower Shop AUs: The crashcourse no one asked for" over on tumblr.
  • DuckDuckGo for helping me finding flower meanings on the fly.
